task.invite_description: Building rockets with friends is more fun! Invite your friends to join the adventure and earn rewards together.
task.subscribe_description: Stay updated with the latest news and exclusive offers
task.bot_description: Clone your voice, have fun with your friends, and explore new possibilities with our bot!
bot.start: 🚀 Welcome to Crypto Rockets! Here, every launch is a chance to win! Launch rockets and earn USDT, TON and awesome Telegram GIFTS. Ready for takeoff? Buckle up — the journey starts right now! 🎁💸
task.premium_rocket_given: Your Premium Rocket is ready for Launch 🔥
task.wheel_given: Try your luck with this golden ticket 🎫
